turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Invasive species in South America.
turn.1: Is the hare an exotic species of animal?
turn.2: The hare is considered a pest in some areas; it is more likely to damage crops and young trees in winter when there are not enough alternative foodstuffs available.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Chital's breeding takes place throughout the year, with peaks that vary geographically.
turn.6: Sperms are produced year-round, though testosterone levels register a fall during the development of the antlers.
turn.7: Is there anything else that is notable?
turn.8: Females have regular estrous cycles, each lasting three weeks.
turn.9: Can you tell me more about the cycles?
turn.10: The female can conceive again two weeks to four months after birth.
turn.12: Due to the quick pace that they can reproduce, the population is growing so rapidly it causes serious damage to agriculture and natural areas.
